constructor:ResourceStoreRelation source

Constructor class for a relation between two stores.

Methods

self.getFkAttr

Gets the FK attribute name.

Returns:

self.getRelatedStore

Gets the store the configured store is related on.

Returns:

self.getStore

Gets the store the relation is configured on.

Returns:

self.handleRemove

Lets the related store forget stale referencing instances, e.g. because the referenced instance was deleted.

self.handleUpdate

Updates the referencing instances where the fkAttr has the given old value to the given new value.
